definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: I wanted to tell everybody about the murderer and organize a search party. Then I thought about the story I would have to tell the police.
sentences.chinese: 我想告诉所有人关于那凶手的事情并组织一个搜索队。

sentences.english: The survivors wandered about the jungle for days before being picked up by a search party.
sentences.chinese: 幸存者在丛林中游荡了好几天，才被搜索队救出来。

sentences.english: The search party found the lost person.
sentences.chinese: 搜索队发现了失踪的人。

sentences.english: Imperial search teams found Dodonna's wounded body and took the officer captive.
sentences.chinese: 帝国搜索队找到身负重伤的多登纳，俘虏了这位军官。

sentences.english: A search party was organized to look for the man trapped in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 雪中被困的人，我们成立了一个搜索队。

sentences.english: Even if they sent out a search party, they would never catch the monster.
sentences.chinese: 就算他们派出了搜索队，他们也不可能抓得住那怪物。

sentences.english: Search parties were sent_out to look for survivors.
sentences.chinese: 搜索队被派出去寻找幸存者。

sentences.english: Search teams were sent to the area but struggled to get through because routes were blocked.
sentences.chinese: 搜索队已经派出，然而由于道路阻塞，目前很难打通。

sentences.english: These antioxidants seek out cell-damaging free radicals and destroy them.
sentences.chinese: 这些抗氧化物会搜索队细胞有害的自由基并摧毁它们。

sentences.english: The one used depended on where the search parties and slave catchers were stationed.
sentences.chinese: 取决于使用的搜索队和奴隶捕手驻扎的地方。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, we hear of search parties going out there to find lost travellers .
sentences.chinese: 可是，听说还是有搜索队到那里去寻找迷路的旅游者。

sentences.english: The search party spread out over the moor.
sentences.chinese: 搜索队在荒草地分散行动。

definition: to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
special detachment/commando/an armed secret agent squad
expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
